title: 4.2 Master Challenge 3
question:
Create an HTML page with a Start and Stop button, along with a div that serves as a color display area. Write the JavaScript code to implement the following:
● When the user clicks the Start button, the background color of the display area should change randomly at time intervals ranging from 1 to 5 seconds. Use the asynchronous functions to achieve this.
● When the user clicks the Stop button, the background color should stop changing.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
